content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2024-12-01 #19674 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in .

Btw, I skimmed the file that prints the message above and I think that the issue is that the string is produced and then printed in a shell eval. I am a little surprised that actionlint does not ban by default eval :stuck_out_tongue_wink:
